TaskAdapter 2.11.2: better support for JIRA 6+

Nov 12, 2015

TaskAdapter 2.11.2 brings improved support for default settings in JIRA 6 installations.

JIRA 6 has new project templates that have some fields enabled/disabled. This new TaskAdapter release provides better default settings for JIRA synchronization.
